actionCards.text: Reveal a total of 2 cards from either the artifact or action deck. Immediately use them or discard them.
Move any one piece that threatens you into your character pool instead.
The Leader must give you your choice of: - an artifact - any specific kind of piece - 2 coins - an action card
Take 3 Thugs and add them to your character pool, you may immediately use them on this turn.
Any number of characters of your choice each gain 3 coins.
Pay any amount of coins. Unless the Leader pays more at the end of this turn, you become Leader instead, they remain in the game without a role card.
Take 2 Assassins and add them to your character pool. You may immediately use them on this turn.
All other characters must give you 2 coins. If they cannot, they must reveal their character pool to prove it.
Discard any one open threat card, and all things placed on it. You lose 1 HP.
